00051   Ahc2OffsetCalibrator::Ahc2OffsetCalibrator() : Processor("Ahc2OffsetCalibrator")
00052   {
00053     _description = "Processor to built events from raw EUDAQ slcio files";
00054 
00055     registerProcessorParameter("InputCollectionName",
00056                                "Name of the input collection of EUDAQ raw data",
00057                                _inputColName,
00058                                std::string(""));
00059 
00060     registerProcessorParameter("InputCollectionNameBIF",
00061                                "Name of the input BIF collection",
00062                                _inputColNameBIF,
00063                                std::string(""));
00064     
00065     registerProcessorParameter("Output_file",
00066                                "Output rootfile name for number of events per bif offset",
00067                                _outputfile,
00068                                std::string(""));
00069 
00070     StringVec BifExample;
00071     BifExample.push_back("10000");
00072     BifExample.push_back("20000");
00073     BifExample.push_back("10");
00074   
00075     registerOptionalParameter( "BifHandler" , 
00076                                "Start of the scan, stop of scan and step"  ,
00077                                _BifVector ,
00078                                BifExample ,
00079                                BifExample.size()) ;
00080   }

00085   void Ahc2OffsetCalibrator::init() {
00086     LcioEventNr = 0;
00087     nCorrelatedEvt.clear();
00088 
00089     //Scan parameters
00090     StartScan = 0;
00091     StopScan = 0;
00092     StepScan = 0;
00093 
00094     //Process Bif scan parameters
00095     if( parameterSet( "BifHandler" ) ) 
00096       {
00097         unsigned index = 0 ;
00098         while( index < _BifVector.size() )
00099           {
00100           
00101             std::string strStart( _BifVector[ index++ ] ); 
00102             std::string strStop( _BifVector[ index++ ] ); 
00103             std::string strStep( _BifVector[ index++ ] ); 
00104           
00105             StartScan = atoi(strStart.c_str());
00106             StopScan = atoi(strStop.c_str());
00107             StepScan = atoi(strStep.c_str());
00108           }
00109       }
00110 
00111     printParameters();
00112   }
00113 
00114   void Ahc2OffsetCalibrator::processEvent(LCEvent* evt){
00115   
00116     int EUDAQEvtNumber = evt->getEventNumber();
00117     int Timestamp = 0;//Event Timestamp
00118     unsigned long long int TimeStamp_start = 0;//BIF Start Timestamp
00119     unsigned long long int TimeStamp_stop = 0;//BIF Stop Timestamp
00120 
00121     int read_0[5];
00122     std::vector<int> read_ADC;
00123     std::vector<int> read_TDC;
00124 
00125     rawData2016 blockData;
00126                  
00127     std::map< int, std::vector<rawData2016> > rData;           
00128     std::vector<int>  rBIF;
00129     std::vector< std::vector<int> > new_rBIF;
00130 
00131     LCCollection* col = NULL; //data collection
00132     LCCollection* colBIF = NULL; //bif collection
00133  
00134     try
00135       {
00136         //fetch EUDAQ data unsorted collection
00137         col = evt->getCollection( _inputColName );
00138       }
00139     catch(EVENT::DataNotAvailableException &e)
00140       {
00141         streamlog_out(WARNING)<< "Event " << EUDAQEvtNumber << " missing collection "
00142                               <<_inputColName<<endl<<e.what()<<endl;
00143 
00144         if(evt->getTimeStamp() == -1)
00145           throw SkipEventException(this);
00146         else
00147           return;
00148       }
00149 
00150     //Get Timestamp from data
00151     string Timestamp_str = col->getParameters().getStringVal("Timestamp");
00152     struct tm tm;
00153     time_t epoch;
00154 
00155     strptime(Timestamp_str.c_str(), "%a, %d %b %Y %H:%M:%S %z", &tm);
00156     epoch = mktime(&tm);
00157 
00158     Timestamp = epoch;
00159 
00160     //Data Block
00161     for(int ielm = 0; ielm < col->getNumberOfElements(); ielm++)
00162       {
00163         LCObject *obj = col->getElementAt(ielm);
00164         EUDAQBlock2016 lBlock(obj);
00165             
00166         read_0[0] = lBlock.GetCycleNr();
00167         read_0[1] = lBlock.GetBunchXID();
00168         read_0[2] = lBlock.GetEvtNr();
00169         read_0[3] = lBlock.GetChipID();
00170         read_0[4] = lBlock.GetNChannels();
00171 
00172         read_TDC = lBlock.GetTDC();
00173         read_ADC = lBlock.GetADC();
00174 
00175         blockData.iCycleNr = read_0[0];
00176         blockData.iBxID = read_0[1];
00177         blockData.iEvNr = read_0[2];
00178         blockData.iCpID = read_0[3];
00179         blockData.iNChan = read_0[4];
00180         blockData.iTDC  = read_TDC;
00181         blockData.iADC  = read_ADC;
00182                 
00183         rData[read_0[1]].push_back(blockData);
00184       }
00185 
00186     streamlog_out(DEBUG4) <<" rData.size(): "<< rData.size() << endl;   
00187 
00188     //Try fetch BIF Data
00189     try
00190       {
00191         //fetch EUDAQ temperature data collection
00192         colBIF= evt->getCollection(_inputColNameBIF) ;
00193       }
00194     catch(EVENT::DataNotAvailableException &e)
00195       {
00196         streamlog_out(WARNING)<< "Event " << EUDAQEvtNumber << " missing collection "
00197                               <<_inputColNameBIF<<endl<<e.what()<<endl;
00198 
00199         if(evt->getTimeStamp() == -1)
00200           throw SkipEventException(this);
00201         else
00202           return;
00203       }
00204 
00205     //BIF Block
00206     for(int ielm = 0; ielm < colBIF->getNumberOfElements(); ielm++)
00207       {
00208         LCGenericObject *obj = dynamic_cast<LCGenericObject*>(colBIF->getElementAt(ielm));
00209 
00210         //Check Start and Stop
00211         unsigned int start_acq = (unsigned int)obj->getIntVal(0);
00212         unsigned int stop_acq = (unsigned int)obj->getIntVal(obj->getNInt() - 4);
00213         
00214         bool skipEvent = false;
00215 
00216         if( ((start_acq)&0xFF000000) != BIF_START_ACQ )
00217           {
00218             streamlog_out(WARNING)<< "Problem with the start acquisition of the BIF" << endl;
00219             skipEvent = true;
00220           }
00221         
00222         if( ((stop_acq)&0xFF000000) != BIF_STOP_ACQ )
00223           {
00224             streamlog_out(WARNING)<< "Problem with the stop acquisition of the BIF" << endl;
00225             skipEvent = true;
00226           }
00227 
00228         if(skipEvent)
00229           {
00230             streamlog_out(WARNING)<< "Skipping event " << EUDAQEvtNumber << " because of missing start/stop acquisition" << endl;
00231             throw SkipEventException(this);
00232           }
00233 
00234         //Get Timestamp start
00235         unsigned int start_TS_low = (unsigned int)obj->getIntVal(2);
00236         unsigned int start_TS_high = (unsigned int)obj->getIntVal(3);
00237         TimeStamp_start = ( (unsigned long long int)start_TS_high<<32 | start_TS_low );
00238         
00239         //Get Timestamp stop
00240         unsigned int stop_TS_low = (unsigned int)obj->getIntVal(obj->getNInt() - 2);
00241         unsigned int stop_TS_high = (unsigned int)obj->getIntVal(obj->getNInt() - 1);
00242         TimeStamp_stop = ( (unsigned long long int)stop_TS_high<<32 | stop_TS_low );
00243 
00244         streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " BIF Block - Start Time : " << TimeStamp_start << endl 
00245                              << " - Stop Time : " << TimeStamp_stop << endl 
00246                              << " Acq time : " << TimeStamp_stop - TimeStamp_start << endl;
00247 
00248         //Push values in vector without start and stop
00249         for(int i = 4; i < obj->getNInt() - 4; i++)
00250           {
00251             rBIF.push_back(obj->getIntVal(i));
00252           }
00253 
00254         //Divide original vector in N vector corresponding to N triggers of the BIF each of a size of 4
00255         unsigned int nTrigger = (int)rBIF.size()/4;
00256         streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "Number of BIF Trigger in the ROC " << EUDAQEvtNumber 
00257                              << " : " << nTrigger << endl;
00258 
00259         new_rBIF.resize(nTrigger);
00260         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < nTrigger; i++)
00261           {
00262             new_rBIF[i].resize(4);
00263             for(unsigned int ii = 0; ii < 4; ii++)
00264               {
00265                 new_rBIF[i][ii] = rBIF.at(4*i + ii);
00266               }
00267           }
00268 
00269         rBIF.clear();
00270       }
00271 
00272     // **********************************************************
00273     //  Processing data
00274     //  build events according to the different BunchXID
00275     //  within one CycleNr, and remove them,
00276     //  until all collected data have been asigned to an event.
00277     // **********************************************************
00278 
00279     for(std::map< int, vector<rawData2016> >::iterator it=rData.begin(); it!=rData.end();++it)
00280       { 
00281         //streamlog_out(DEBUG)<< " ===== Ahc2OffsetCalibrator processing Event "<< LcioEventNr <<"  ======" << endl;
00282         LcioEventNr++; //Event start from 1.
00283 
00284         //Create new BIF Blocks
00285         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < new_rBIF.size(); i++)
00286           {
00287             int source = -1;
00288             unsigned int TriggerSource = (unsigned int)new_rBIF[i].at(0);
00289 
00290             if( ((TriggerSource)&0xFFF0000) == BIF_1ST_LEMO )
00291               source = 0;
00292             if( ((TriggerSource)&0xFFF0000) == BIF_2ND_LEMO )
00293               source = 1;
00294             if( ((TriggerSource)&0xFFF0000) == BIF_3RD_LEMO )
00295               source = 2;
00296             if( ((TriggerSource)&0xFFF0000) == BIF_4TH_LEMO )
00297               source = 3;
00298             
00299             unsigned int TS_low = (unsigned int)new_rBIF[i].at(2);
00300             unsigned int TS_high = (unsigned int)new_rBIF[i].at(3);
00301             unsigned long long int TimeStamp = ( (unsigned long long int)TS_high<<32 | TS_low );
00302 
00303             //Relative time to start acquisition
00304             unsigned long long int RelativeTime = TimeStamp - TimeStamp_start;
00305 
00306             //Start of scan of bifoffset
00307             for(int _offset = StartScan; _offset <= StopScan;)
00308               {
00309                 //BXID of the Trigger
00310                 int BXID_BIF = (int)(RelativeTime - _offset)/BIF_BINNING;
00311                 //Time of the Trigger
00312                 float Time_BIF = (float)((RelativeTime - _offset)%BIF_BINNING * BIF_RESOLUTION);
00313 
00314                 if(it->first == BXID_BIF)
00315                   {
00316                     nCorrelatedEvt[_offset]++;
00317                   }
00318 
00319                 //streamlog_out(DEBUG) <<"Event " << LcioEventNr << " BXID Correlated " << nCorrelatedEvt[_offset] << " with offset " << _offset <<  endl;
00320 
00321                 _offset += StepScan;//increase scan step
00322               }
00323           }
00324       } // loop map key to save the event with each CycleNr.
00325     
00326     new_rBIF.clear();
00327     rData.clear();
00328 
00329     throw SkipEventException(this);
00330   }// look into collection
00331 
00332   void Ahc2OffsetCalibrator::end() {
00333 
00334     int ipoint = 0;
00335 
00336     TGraph *_bifgraph = new TGraph();
00337 
00338     //Write results to file
00339     for(int _offset = StartScan; _offset <= StopScan;)
00340       {
00341         streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "Total Number of BXID Correlated " << nCorrelatedEvt[_offset] << " with offset " << _offset <<  endl;
00342 
00343         _bifgraph->SetPoint(ipoint, _offset, nCorrelatedEvt[_offset]);
00344         ipoint++;
00345 
00346         _offset += StepScan;//increase scan step
00347       }
00348 
00349     _bifgraph->SetMarkerSize(20);
00350     _bifgraph->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Offset");
00351     _bifgraph->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Number of correlated events");
00352 
00353     _bifgraph->SetName("Offset vs Number of Correlated Events");
00354     _bifgraph->SetTitle("Offset vs Number of Correlated Events");
00355 
00356     TFile *fOut = new TFile(_outputfile.c_str(), "RECREATE");
00357     fOut->cd();
00358     _bifgraph->Write();
00359     fOut->Close();
00360 
00361     streamlog_out(MESSAGE) <<" ===== End of Ahc2OffsetCalibrator processor ===== " <<  endl;
00362 
00363   }
00364 
00365   void Ahc2OffsetCalibrator::printParameters() {
00366 
00367     cout <<" ===== Parameters Ahc2OffsetCalibrator processor ===== " <<  endl;
00368     cout << "Intput Collections : " << _inputColName 
00369          << "\t" << _inputColNameBIF << endl;
00370 
00371     cout << "Scan parameters: " << endl
00372          << "\t Start " << StartScan << endl
00373          << "\t Stop " << StopScan << endl
00374          << "\t Step " << StepScan << endl;
00375   
00376   }
